definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: How did you connect with Tudou?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何與土豆網建立聯繫的？

sentences.english: Compared to the overall markets, Tudou is doing great.
sentences.chinese: 與大盤相比，土豆網表現很好。

definition: variant of 獨角戲|独角戏[du2 jiao3 xi4]
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
interlude/to cross the stage/to do sth as a mere formality/to go through the motions
lit. the lioness from Hedong roars (idiom)/fig. refers to a shrewish wife or a henpecked husband
abbr. for 北愛爾蘭|北爱尔兰[Bei3 Ai4 er3 lan2], Northern Ireland
courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
cheerleading squad/also written 啦啦隊|啦啦队
barrage (military)/"bullet screen", function which allows viewers to post on-screen comments in videos, movies etc in real time/danmaku (video game subgenre)
